1. What is the most frequent fire incident during July 2015 to June 2016? (CFA Incident Responses)

```{r}
excel_sheets("data//CFA-Incident-Responses.xlsx")
min(incident$incident_datetime)

# read the data
library(readxl)
incident<- read_excel("data/CFA-Incident-Responses.xlsx", sheet = 1)


# count number of incident
incident_count<- incident %>% 
  count(code_description) %>% 
  arrange(desc(n)) %>% 
  head(10) %>% 
  kable()
```
